FREE_TEXT.COST1: With MESIMA you significantly save on the cost of services
FREE_TEXT.JOIN: will join the service and start making money
FREE_TEXT.DESCRIBE: Describe in your own words the task, which you want to perform.
FREE_TEXT.OFFER: Specialists will offer you their     services and prices
FREE_TEXT.RECEIVE: In a few minutes you will begin to receive offers from specialists, ready-made fulfill your task
FREE_TEXT.ABLE: You will be able to choose a suitable specialist, according to different criteria:
FREE_TEXT.SERV1: Service, is designed for convenient and quick search of performers for any household and business tasks. We place the assignment on the service and immediately begin to receive offers from performers ready to perform your task.
FREE_TEXT.SERV2: Now you do not need to look for a master, a courier, a carrier, a nurse. They will find you, make an offer, and you will choose the best performer.
FREE_TEXT.SERV3: The service will offer you a solution for any tasks at a time convenient for you and at reasonable prices.The service operates all over Israel.
